scripts.dev: concurrently -n "infra,backend,frontend,mcp,scheduler" -c "blue,green,cyan,magenta,yellow" "npm run dev:infra" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:mcp" "npm run dev:scheduler"
scripts.dev:backend: wait-on tcp:5432 && cd backend && pnpm install && pnpm run migration:run && pnpm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend: wait-on http://localhost:3333/health && cd frontend && pnpm install && pnpm run dev && open http://localhost:3000
scripts.dev:mcp: wait-on tcp:5432 && cd mcp-server && pnpm install && pnpm run dev
scripts.dev:scheduler: wait-on tcp:5432 && cd scheduler && pnpm install && pnpm run dev
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd backend && pnpm install && cd ../frontend && pnpm install && cd ../mcp-server && pnpm install && cd ../scheduler && pnpm install
scripts.clean: docker-compose down -v && rm -rf backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules mcp-server/node_modules scheduler/node_modules node_modules
scripts.build: cd backend && pnpm run build && cd ../frontend && pnpm run build && cd ../mcp-server && pnpm run build && cd ../scheduler && pnpm run build
